      • playRound

        static java.lang.String playRound​(java.util.Stack<Cards> cardStack)
                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method simulates the round for the player and dealer
        Parameters:
        cardStack - This is the current deck available for this round
        Returns:
        A string value is returned indicating whether the player Won, Lost, or Draw
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception is thrown for the thread sleeper, this allows turn to slow down for Dealer's turn

      • getUnrevealedDealerHand

        private static int getUnrevealedDealerHand​(java.util.ArrayList<Cards> dealerHand)
        This method prints the dealer's initial hand, which includes one card faced up and one hidden. This also calculates the inital score of the dealer's hand.
        Parameters:
        dealerHand - This is the cards that the dealer was dealt
        Returns:
        An int value indicating the score of the hand is returned

      • getHand

        private static int getHand​(java.util.ArrayList<Cards> playerHand,
                           java.lang.String hand)
        This method prints the player/dealer hand. This also calculates the score for the player/dealer
        Parameters:
        playerHand - This is the cards that is delt to the player/dealer
        hand - This indicates who the hand belongs to (dealer/player)
        Returns:
        An int value indicating the current score value is returned

      • generateDeck

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Cards> generateDeck​()
        This method generates a standard 52 deck with 4 suits.
        Returns:
        An arraylist of type Card is returned.

      • shuffleDeck

        public static java.util.Stack<Cards> shuffleDeck​(java.util.ArrayList<Cards> arrayDeck)
        This method shuffles the deck by randomly selecting indexes in the Arraylist of cards, and pushing it into the Stack
        Parameters:
        arrayDeck - This is the deck of 52 cards.
        Returns:
        A stack of type Cards is returned which contains 52 cards in random order.

      • dealCard

        public static void dealCard​(java.util.Stack<Cards> deck,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Cards> hand)
        This method deals a card to the player/dealer
        Parameters:
        deck - A stack containing the remaining cards in the deck
        hand - An arraylist containing the player/dealer's current hand
